name: FAMES
description:
FAMES: Android Quiz Game for Grade Four Students" is an educational mobile game application which aims to educate Grade four students the five core subjects including Filipino, Araling Panlipunan, Mathematics, English and Science. “FAMES” is a two-dimensional game that is developed using Unity as the platform and coded using C-Sharp language.

There are two students, a boy and a girl who loves adventure and knowledge. On their way home, they wanted to learn more. Each have different paths where they can learn more about different subjects and enjoy learning as there are.
